Desc.entry: Member of the BackActive Chiropractic Clinics group. All the clinic Chiropractors are members of the British Chiropractic Association and are registered with the General Chiropractic Council. All Chiropractors are doctors of Chiropractic and not medical doctors. Chiropractic treatment does not involve drugs or surgery but involves hands-on specific chiropractic manipulation, soft tissue work and exercises. The first consultation and examination lasts 30-45 minutes and costs £49, treatments thereafter last approximately 15 minutes and cost £29. Treatments are covered by most private medical insurers including BUPA, HAS, PPP and Westfield. The clinic also offers massage therapy and a Podiatrist. Digital X-ray facilities are available at a Rotherham Chiropractic clinic.
